resources.string: Different Class
Settings
Error initializing YouTube player
Jump To
Seconds
Asa Moto, with their vintage analogue beats, are one of the newest signees on the Deewee label, run by the Dewaele brothers.
Young dutch pop chanteuse BEA1991 is about to break through internationally. She’s the protégé of Dev Hynes so watch this space.

Creating down-tempo minimalistic synths and alienating supercooled voices singing about alien babies and twirling silver fish on the bathroom floor, Easter want to bring something bigger into this world, opening up the gates to a dark otherworldly realm.
Fans of the emo He4rtbroken nights will be glad to hear this collective is closing. Tissues available at the door.
Swedish-based music that ‘represents and imitates all articulate sounds and letters, and the voices and noise of beasts and birds’.
New York rapper and producer LE1F’s rapid-fire lyrics frequently confront his experience as an openly-gay hip-hop artist, which is sure to make this a must-see performance.
Pruikduif was formed as the result of a ping-pong jam session. Soon a bunch of songs emerged, mixing post-punk attitude with challenging pop tunes.
Sheniqua equals a mélange of heavy beats, dark vocals, trance vibes, weird visuals and sexy dance moves.
This Parisian electro duo promises highly danceable and aquatic synth-pop tunes. The ideal music to metaphorically float away on…
Dok-Noord 5L, 9000 Gent, België
View in Maps
